topic.title: How to use ZeroNet on mobile?
topic.body: Is there any ZeroNet App for iOS?

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: How can I visit ZeroNet on iOS?

1509253345_13aB79mzuRLgDYzQthn9wzycjw77W.body: maybe you could use `top.title` cause page is shown in iframe.

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: 不是所有的毛毛虫都能变成蝴蝶因为他娘的有的是蛆
